A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After two years of brewing theories\, hopes\, and dreams\, The Last Jedi's uninspired\, corny\, and extremely Disneyfied screenplay creates a film of underwhelming plot development\, undeveloped character development\, unaware absurdity\, and sheer disappointment. This is not the Episode VIII we were hoping for. If the trajectory of this story can be salvaged\, only J.J. Abrams can do the job...so\, bring him back...
